message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $9,500 is fair. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident this product is worth more. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I still feel that $8,500 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can reach a satisfactory agreement.
